verses.name: Romans 10:6
verses.text: But the righteousness which is of faith speaketh on this wise, Say not in thine heart, Who shall ascend into heaven? (that is, to bring Christ down from above:)

verses.name: Romans 10:7
verses.text: Or, Who shall descend into the deep? (that is, to bring up Christ again from the dead.)

verses.name: Romans 10:8
verses.text: But what saith it? The word is nigh thee, even in thy mouth, and in thy heart: that is, the word of faith, which we preach;
